page.title: 07 Building
page.content: Building is a completely different process now. It is done in such a way that the amount of things used, i. e. bricks and cement are measured to a perfect standard. The structure is a very important part.This is designed by an architect who tests whether or not it will work. He puts it into a computer which works out the dimensions of it,then says if it is going to stand up ,or be a disaster. Some builders have to make ascale model of the building. this is to show where things will go and if they will be hazard to people or not. Houses have to be built in such a way that they are comfortable for the people to live in.Rooms must be arranged in such a way so as to be convenient to the owner. S.Navin Aged 12 Yrs.
